input.comment H: int: height of the draw image
input.comment W: int: width of the draw image
input.comment thickness: int: proportionnal thickness according to the diagonal of the image size

output.comment H: int: height of the output image
output.comment W: int: width of the output image
output.comment crop: bool: whether to crop the output image to only be the region where the user has drawn

process.comment_volume: int: number of sample by class we can to get at the end
process.comment_selection: str: process of selection. can be RANDOM|CLASSBYCLASS|ROTATE

storage.comment root: str: path to the root folder

line.comment thickness: int or list of int: proportional thickness according to the diagonal of the input size
line.comment range_value: int or list of int: random range for line value when drawing
line.comment fading: int: value of the border fade for a linear fading

interpolation.comment method: str or list of str: OpenCV interpolation for resizing to ouput. Can be INTER_NEAREST|INTER_LINEAR|INTER_AREA|INTER_CUBIC|INTER_LANCZOS4|RANDOM
